name: Fortis Rex Rise Of The King..
blurb: Build up your own custom army and lead your troops to victory in this High Medieval Army Commanding RPG

rewards.reward: We will mention your name in the credits of Fortis Rex, and you will receive exclusive Screenshots of our work in the game(and when the game comes out). Plus our sincerest THANK YOU!
Your name in a more exclusive place in the credits of Fortis Rex(than the $1 reward). Plus all the rewards in the $1 tier.
----------------PRE-ORDER-------------- Your name in a more exclusive place than in the $5 tier, and a digital copy of the FULL version of Fortis Rex, plus all previous rewards.

PRE-ORDER + ALL DLC FOR FREE Previous reward, plus an in-game weapon and suit of armor you can only get HERE ON KICKSTARTER, Bronze Supporter in game credits, Free Downloads of all updates and expansion packs we release for Fortis Rex, PLUS BEHIND THE SCENES FOOTAGE ON THE MAKING OF THE GAME(We have released one already, which you will have immediate access to)!

PRE-ORDER + BETA + BONUS COPY Previous rewards, EARLY BETA(and early Alpha) ACCESS, a BONUS copy of the game(to use how you want), AND PURE BRONZE SUPPORTER STATUS IN GAME CREDITS, PLUS MORE EXCLUSIVE SCREENSHOTS, PLUS an exclusive in-game weapon you will only find HERE ON KICKSTARTER!

BETA + GIFT COPY + NAME A WEAPON----------- Previous rewards, Extra Bonus Copy of the game, SILVER STATUS IN GAME CREDITS, PLUS you can name a weapon in Fortis Rex, AND THE EXCLUSIVE SOUNDTRACK FROM FORTIS REX! Only 90 available.(Partial soundtrack available approximately October 2013, Full Soundtrack Feburary 2014).

-NAME + DESIGN YOUR OWN TAVERN!- Previous rewards, two more bonus copies, PURE SILVER status in GAME CREDITS, and you can work personally with Justin Nelson to name and design a TAVERN(PUB) + A special Brewery(that we design) that brews your own special brew(the name that you give it) + Your name in the credits with your contribution to the game! Only 14 available.

------NAME YOUR OWN TOWN---- Previous rewards, two more bonus copies, PURE SILVER status in GAME CREDITS, and you can work personally with Justin Nelson to name a WHOLE TOWN + Your name in the credits with your contribution to the game! Only 20 available.

----DESIGN AN NPC + QUEST----- PREVIOUS REWARDS IN THE 50 DOLLAR TIER, AND GOLD STATUS IN THE GAME CREDITS, PLUS you get to DESIGN YOUR OWN CUSTOM QUEST AND CUSTOM NPC + 2 Bonus Copies + Your name in the credits as a character designer! Only 18 available.

---NAME AND DESIGN A TOWN--- Previous Rewards in the 50 dollar tier, PLUS the ability to work with Justin Nelson personally to design and name an ENTIRE TOWN, Your name in the credits as a LEVEL DESIGNER, AND PURE GOLD STATUS IN THE GAME CREDITS + 4 bonus copies of the game! Only 13 available.

-FREE GAMES + ALL DLC FREE- Previous Rewards in the 50 dollar tier, Free downloads of every game we release, PLUS all DLC for the game for free, and PLATINUM status in game credits + 10 bonus copies of the game! Only 7 available.

----GET YOU FACE IN THE GAME---- Previous rewards in the 50 dollar tier, plus we will make a model of YOUR HEAD AND FACE and put it in the game AND DIAMOND STATUS IN THE GAME CREDITS + 20 bonus copies! Only 4 AVAILABLE!

----BECOME LORD OF A CASTLE--- KING status in the GAME CREDITS, PLUS A MAJOR PLACEMENT IN THE GAME WORLD(ALL PLAYERS WILL INTERACT WITH YOU) PLUS A MAJOR CASTLE(plus servants) AND ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS(DESIGN A TOWN AND EVERYTHING ELSE!) + 50 bonus copies of the game. Only 4 available ----------------NOTE: If we run out of the above rewards, we will add additional gameplay to give you EVERYTHING above. That means you get to design your own weapon, town, have the town named the name you give it, every game and DLC we release FOR FREE, your name and face in the game, your own castle(complete with servants), and King status in game credits. You will be part of the main quest and ALL players will interact with you!

----EVERYTHING + MAJOR CONTRIBUTOR---- EVERYTHING mentioned above, ALL THE REWARDS, YOUR NAME MENTIONED FIRST IN THE CREDITS AS A MAJOR CONTRIBUTOR(even before the team is listed), PLUS the ability to direct us in the design of 10 OBJECTS OF YOUR CHOICE(anything in the game, weapons, castles, towns, ANYTHING!) You can personally NAME and DESIGN whatever you want for Fortis Rex and we will bring into reality! Ever wanted to design your own custom level or character? You can do it with this package! Only One More Left! Be the second person to claim this awesome package!
